channel.title: Server hosting
channel.description:
I know this is a common problem that people ask a lot.
I cannot get a Static IP which means I can't portforward. When I go to 192.168.1.1 it says "Obtain an IP Automatically" instead of "Static IP".
So I'm sure my ISP isn't gonna let me have one. I have like Xfinity or Comcast. I am really good at Developing servers, but I can never get my server online.
Is there any way I can host a server without port forwarding? or paying?

item.title: Server hosting
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

If you don’t pay for it then it’ll probably be shit. Just saying. But, yeah, I’d say get a cheap vps
http://dataspherehosting.net/

Read full topic
